        public void moveLeftJoystick(double direction,
                             double magnitudeGauche)
        Calculates the postition of the robot head with the direction and magnitude of the joystick. The head position is then send to the server. This method is called when the left joystick is moved.
        Specified by:
        moveLeftJoystick in interface ItfWrkXbox
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the left joystick
        magnitudeGauche - the magnitude of the left joystick

      • moveRightJoystick

        public void moveRightJoystick(double direction,
                              double magnitude)
        Sends direction and magnitude to the controller to display the joystick in the Ihm. It sends the left and right track speed to the server.This method is called when the right joystick is moved.
        Specified by:
        moveRightJoystick in interface ItfWrkXbox
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the right joystick
        magnitude - the magnitude of the right joystick

        public double[] throttleAngleToThrust(double r,
                                      double theta)
        Tranforms datas from joytick to left and right speed
        Parameters:
        r - , magnitude of the joystick
        theta, - angle of the joystick
        Returns:
        [leftSpeed,rightSpeed]
